definitions: An aggressive and violent act against a person or place.
Destructive action by a disease, chemical, or insect.
A determined attempt to tackle a problem or task.
Forceful and decisive style in performing music or another art.
An instance of fierce public criticism or opposition.
A sudden short bout of an illness or stress.
(in sport) an aggressive attempt to score a goal or point or otherwise gain an advantage.
The players in a team who are in the position of trying to score a goal or win points.
A threat to capture an opponent's piece or pawn.
